review: I have high speed internet, and have multiple apple TV devices, multiple computers and mobile devices that all have no problems working.  I have yet to be able to use the fire stick to watch a program where it does not reset and disconnect multiple times saying device error an internet connection is required.  The setting show I have a full strength "Very Good" signal strength and this is the only device that continually fails.  Even with no other devices turned on.. I cant watch more than 3 minutes of a show before it drops signal and resets.  If this was more than $35 I would be more upset - but it just isn't worth the time and frustration to fight with it.I renewed Netflix and have effectively moved on from even trying to use firestick.  I tested it again because I got the request to review.... 4 minutes in to a show and it disconnected.Gary Busey was wrong, the sea shell is much more valuable - it doesn't waste my time.
author: Adventure Dives
